- 包管理器`Homebrew`[Homebrew](http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/ "Homebrew")
- `zsh`

    brew install zsh

- [Oh-my-zsh](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh "oh-my-zsh")  
- 其他东西以后面谈,需要一点配置
